19g PROTEIN
Dessert

MONSTER COOKIE PROTEIN BALLS

Loaded monster cookie protein balls with oats, peanut butter, chocolate, and M&Ms. 19g protein.

19g
Protein
185
Calories
15m
Total Time
18
Yield

Nutrition per 2 balls

Carbs18g
Fat9g
Fiber3g
Sugar10g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 150g rolled oats
  • 60g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 192g peanut butter
  • 60g honey
  • 40g mini M&Ms
  • 40g mini chocolate chips

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Mix Base

Combine oats, protein powder, peanut butter, and honey.

2

Add Mix-ins

Fold in M&Ms and chocolate chips.

3

Roll

Form into 18 balls.

4

Press Toppings

Press extra M&Ms on top if desired.

5

Chill

Refrigerate 30 minutes.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
